text: We rescheduled the kickoff to next Tuesday afternoon.
Please invite the logistics team to the prep call.
Remember to print twenty copies of the agenda.
Set aside the west conference room for the briefing.
Order vegetarian lunches for the client delegation.
Follow up with Ava about the security badges.
Translate the welcome packet into Spanish this week.
Arrange a shuttle from the hotel to the venue.
Confirm the photographer can arrive by 8 AM.
Send the revised floor plan to facilities.
Prepare a backup projector in the control booth.
Share the wifi credentials with the speakers.
Upload the updated run of show to the shared drive.
Draft a reminder email for the keynote panelists.
Coordinate rehearsal slots with the production crew.
Label the storage bins for signage and banners.
Double-check that the stage lighting cues are scripted.
Schedule a quick sync with the AV vendor tomorrow.
Bring extra extension cords for the registration desk.
Print nametags for the late registrants before Friday.
Confirm interpreter availability for the morning plenary.
Update the crisis contact sheet with the new numbers.
Stage bottled water behind the main podium.
Collect dietary restrictions from visiting partners.
Reserve a quiet room for remote presenters to dial in.
Assign volunteers to guide guests during breaks.
Calibrate the demo laptops tonight.
Test the backup recording rig after lunch.
Restock the swag table with notebooks and pens.
Ship the thank-you gifts to sponsors by Monday.
Check the signage for spelling errors before mounting.
Post the session schedule near the elevators.
Replace depleted batteries in the wireless microphones.
Translate the closing remarks into French as well.
Prepare a short debrief template for the team retro.
Clean up the messaging on the welcome marquee display.
Por favor confirma la reserva del salón principal para el viernes.
Envía la agenda actualizada al equipo técnico.
Merci de préparer les badges d'accès supplémentaires d'ici jeudi.
Veuillez afficher le plan de la salle près de l'entrée principale.
Agende uma chamada de alinhamento com a equipe de streaming.
